long_description: Runners and walkers will love the Sorbothane UltraSole Insoles with their extra cushioning, strike protection and profile that encourages proper pronation. Insoles feature a runner's last that properly fits running shoes for high-performance support, foot-strike protection, flexibility and prevention of excessive pronation. Sorbothane Energy Core(TM) under the forefoot provides maximum energy return for an efficient toe-off. Polyurethane layer adds structural support and absorbs and dissipates impact. Non-slip, antifungal foam layer cushions and rebounds to original shape; brushed polyester fabric top adds comfort and extra moisture wicking. Heel insert absorbs up to 94.7% of impact shock, reducing impact-related injuries, jarring, fatigue and pain, while adding comfort. Overstock.
short_description: Runners and walkers will love the Sorbothane UltraSole Insoles with their extra cushioning, strike protection and profile that encourages proper pronation.
